law.text: The venue of prosecutions for crimes committed on the Mississippi, Ohio, Big Sandy or Tennessee Rivers is in any of the counties bordering on the same river.
law.history: Reenacted 1962 Ky. Acts ch. 234, sec. 38. -- Recodified 1942 Ky. Acts ch. 208, sec. 1, effective October 1, 1942, from Ky. Stat. sec. 1144.
